Name: Ephemerid: A Musical Adventure
About the game: 2015 IGF Winner: Excellence in Audio Ephemerid is a rock fairy tale about a paper mayfly. Lean back, relax and enjoy it as a whole, as you would a favorite album. Ephemerid is part rhythm game, part point-and-click adventure, and part rock opera. KEY FEATURES Ephemeridâ€™s beating heart is its original soundtrack, rock guitar with a classical flair. The world of Ephemerid is faithfully handcrafted out of cut paper, glass, and paint. Each setting introduces intuitive challenges which play in harmony with the music. ACCOLADES 2015 IGF Winner: Excellence in Audio 2014 SXSW Gamer's Voice Finalist 2014 BIG Festival Finalist 2013 IndieCade Finalist 2013 Captivate Finalist
